system:
note description: "Used for describing a particular PND target" author: "" date: "$Date: 2013-05-20 16:15:17 -0700 (Mon, 20 May 2013) $" revision: "$Revision: 92557 $"
class ../interface/ev_pnd_target_data.xmlEV_PND_TARGET_DATA
create Falsedefault_create
feature -- Access
f_target../interface/ev_pnd_target_data.xml#f_targettarget: detachable ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xmlEV_ABSTRACT_PICK_AND_DROPABLE -- Target of PND menu item.
f_name../interface/ev_pnd_target_data.xml#f_namename: FalseSTRING_32 -- Name for PND menu item. do if attached ../interface/ev_pnd_target_data.xml#f_internal_nameinternal_name as l_internal_name then Result := l_internal_name else create Result.Falsemake_empty end end
f_pixmap../interface/ev_pnd_target_data.xml#f_pixmappixmap: detachable ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP -- Pixmap used in PND menu item, if Void then no pixmap is used.
feature -- Element Change
f_set_name../interface/ev_pnd_target_data.xml#f_set_nameset_name (a_name: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL) -- Set ../interface/ev_pnd_target_data.xml#f_namename to a_name. require a_name_not_void: a_name /= Void do ../interface/ev_pnd_target_data.xml#f_internal_nameinternal_name := a_name.Falseas_string_32 ensure name_assigned: ../interface/ev_pnd_target_data.xml#f_namename.Falsesame_string_general (a_name) end
f_set_pixmap../interface/ev_pnd_target_data.xml#f_set_pixmapset_pixmap (a_pixmap: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP) -- Set a_pixmap to a_pixmap. require a_pixmap_not_void: a_pixmap /= Void do ../interface/ev_pnd_target_data.xml#f_pixmappixmap := a_pixmap ensure pixmap_assigned: ../interface/ev_pnd_target_data.xml#f_pixmappixmap = a_pixmap end
feature {../implementation_interface/ev_application_i.xmlEV_APPLICATION_I} -- Implementation
f_set_target../interface/ev_pnd_target_data.xml#f_set_targetset_target (a_target: like ../interface/ev_pnd_target_data.xml#f_targettarget) -- Set ../interface/ev_pnd_target_data.xml#f_targettarget to a_target. require a_target_not_void: a_target /= Void do ../interface/ev_pnd_target_data.xml#f_targettarget := a_target ensure target_assigned: ../interface/ev_pnd_target_data.xml#f_targettarget = a_target end
f_internal_name../interface/ev_pnd_target_data.xml#f_internal_nameinternal_name: detachable FalseSTRING_32

end -- class ../interface/ev_pnd_target_data.xmlEV_PND_TARGET_DATA
